page.title: 05Cowbridge Civic Service
page.content: The Scouts, Cubs, Brownies, Guides, ATC, (Air Training Corps.) the Royal British Legion, councillors and representatives from the education establishments and commerce met at the Town Hall and then, led by the Mayor, Councillor Alan Rees marched to Holy Cross Church. The Reverend Gwilym Williams met the Mayor at the door and conducted him to his seat. The service began with the singing of the National Anthem. During the singing of the hymn the standards were collected at the altar. The sermon was given by the Reverend Keith Jones. At the end of the service the congregation left in the following order: The Standards, the general public, the Mayoral party and the Mayors procession who all marched down the main street to the Town Hall. { Christopher Elmes}
